item.title: Accessible Tech Lecture
item.description: Just attended on the Wednesday (01/02/17) a Great lecture on Accessible Mobile Technology hosted at Sheffield Hallam University. The Barnsley Assistive Technology Team is a nationally recognised specialised service that works with other professionals in local teams to provide electronic assistive technology. Vicky and her team went into such a great level of depth without getting overly bogged down in the details. I can wholeheartedly recommend that you book them in if you can.
